verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus has a table spread where the saints
of God are fed,
He invites His chosen people "Come and
me;"
With His manna He doth feed and
supplies our every need;
O, 'tis sweet to sup with Jesus all the
time!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
CHORUS
"Come and dine," the Master calleth,
"Come and dine;"
You may feast at Jesus' table all the
time;
He who fed the multitude, turned the
water into wine,
To the hungry calleth now, "Come and
dine."

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The disciples came to land, thus obeying
Christ's command,
For the Master called to them, "Come
and dine;"
There they found their hearts' desire,
bread and fish upon the fire;
Thus He satisfies the hungry every time.

verse.name: v4
